name: Olivia's Dino Smash
description:
Arcade style action. Be a summoned dinosaur taking on waves of zombie hordes.

Made for BGSJam XVII to theme of Necromancy

Developer: John Futscher

Developer: Jeanine Moyer

Art: Deja Stevens-Smith

Music: Cortland Mahoney

Sound, Design, and Testing: Aemon Moyer

Design and Testing: Olivia Futscher
